answers.answer: As long as you arent high risk for preterm labor I think that's a great time. Go to pinterest and type in baby shower ideas you'll find hundreds. Congrats!
Lol oopsss sorryyy a baby boy!!!:))
Well actually theyre trying to.find out if I hAve preeclampsia... Took my pee jug yesterday. But yea hoping for the best!

A lot of women have theirs around that time, so you should be fine.I would sent out invites a month in advance,  do simple foods, like sandwhiches, pasta or a bbq if the weather is good by you.I spent way too much on decorations at party city...so I suggest looking at the dollar store first!

Oh okie yea I.thought so too!!! Yea.it'll be on a summer time here. So its exciting itll,be nice nd hot.Yea we thought buying some.of the stuff at the dollar store:) nd.food yea my moms cooking for me lol yea sending invitations 2 months ahead:)
Sometimes handing out a list of wat u wuld like to have is good, but hey suprises r more fun cos a list is limited, consider gift cards too so u can purchase whats short. Congrats n good luck

Mines april 5th .. ftm ill be 35 weeks also measuring a week ahead .. pregnancys been good but moms worried i wont make it but i beleive i will. We send out invites 6 weeks prior. Went to dollar store amazon and target. Got ideas off pinterest for decor and games // gifts. My moms friends are all cooking something and bringing it to help out. Or u can do like platter plates at stop and shop .. we were doing that at first. Also getting cupcakes made at stop and shop to go w my theme which is blue and green polka dots sweet dreams baby carriage.Music mommie advice and take alot of pics!
You just might be exhausted by the end of it I had mine at 33+6 an oh my I was so tired an my back was killing me!
I'm having mine this weekend I'll be 35w2d :)
